data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Nièvre to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nièvre, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Nièvre, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Lord, make the 2,798 believers in Nièvre to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 224,902 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Nièvre, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jew, Swiss-speaking people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
God, we pray for the believers in Nièvre, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Nièvre, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 2,798 believers in Nièvre, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.
